topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554c14496368727e985f1300#post_554c14496368727e985f1300
I fell down stairs before.
It hurts.
I fell in the bathroom a few times in a year. Each time, my head hit the ground hard.

I think it may be the cause of my personality change during my childhood.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554c14496368727e985f1300#post_554c14496368727e985f1300

Well next time be careful! I don't want to see my buddy get hurt!
